channel.title: Truth or Consequences|Sierra County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Truth or Consequences|Sierra County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 83
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 83 - NM-195/City of Elephant Butte.

item.title: BL-25 North at I-25 Jct.
item.description: BL-25 north at I-25 junction. Merge right for I-25 north to Albuquerque; merge left for I-25 south to Las Cruces.

item.title: BL-25 North Approaching I-25
item.description: BL-25 north approaching I-25. Use left lane for Las Cruces (I-25 south).

item.title: BL-25 South at NM-181
item.description: BL-25 south at NM-181 north to City of Elephant Butte.

item.title: BL-25 South at NM-181
item.description: BL-25 south at NM-181 in Truth or Consequences.

item.title: BL-25 South at NM-118
item.description: BL-25 south at NM-118. Merge right for BL-25 to Truth or Consequences business district.

item.title: I-25 North at Exit 80 Offramp
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 80 offramp, BL-25 jct. Turn right for Truth or Consequences, City of Elephant Butte, and Elephant Butte State Park.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 79
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 79 - BL-25/Truth or Consequences.
